thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 14 of 1846
thread.title: Jose

author: Jose
title: Jose
text:
It's not the first time that it happened and I know it happened to other people, that when you reserve your tickets online, they ask you if you need a bunch of things like rent a car, hotel, insurance, etc. And yy have to select no or sometimes it's already preselected yes and they charged you more. Even if I unselectes the box saying that I didn't need travel insurance, it still charges me the fees.
I call them right away, to tell them it was a mistake and if they could take it off my bill. It was fast and the lady who attended me was nice.
